comment.body:
Rule ( `golem.de##article .go-teaser-block` ) in that filter working fine here.
Please show HTML code (right click on element -> inspect element).
Enabling German filter (in general) for this site is also recommended.

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/198973

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking)
 [https://links.payboxapp.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Flinks.payboxapp.com%2F)
### Comment
> Paybox is a payment app.
> It has a feature of groups, with invantation links.
> When clicking on such link with Adguard on, the app opens but then times out without joining the group. With Adguard disabled it works.
```
Username: @YuvalWS
```

### Screenshots

Information | Value

comment.body:
Hi!
I started to use the private DNS.
There were some domains blocked when I clicked the app link.
Unblocking api2.branch.io solved the issue

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 7 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
Fixed by EasyList Cookie:

> 
> ```adb
> /cookieconsent.js
> ```

due https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/f42214f22edb5df0f9a02b88517c64e474f54f51, may need create section with specific blocking rule or add in line with `###cc-main`.

Second (https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/3d7cc231-50d6-44a7-b96d-cf88116c6490) fixed in Polish GDPR-Cookies Filters: 

> https://github.com/MajkiIT/polish-ads-filter/blob/99460907abb54427a3b82087195b44e505286c1d/cookies_filters/cookies_uB_AG.txt#L203-L206  / https://github.com/FiltersHeroes/PolishSocialCookiesFiltersDev/blob/9898dce25da4df02dcba43bc18e1e7b87abdfb38/sections/adblock_cookies/uBO_AG/komunikaty_suplement.txt#L166-L169

- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
Fixed by EasyList Cookie:

> 
> ```adb
> /cookieconsent.js
> ```

due https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/f42214f22edb5df0f9a02b88517c64e474f54f51, may need create section with specific blocking rule or add in line with `###cc--main`. 
Due to the fact that PR with Polish updates of cookies/GDPR at MajkiIT repository can take up to 5 days to merge (whereas ACN provides a fix within an hour of being addressed), I recommend continue to address large Polish websites in ACN.

---

Second (https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/3d7cc231-50d6-44a7-b96d-cf88116c6490) fixed in Polish GDPR-Cookies Filters: 

> https://github.com/MajkiIT/polish-ads-filter/blob/99460907abb54427a3b82087195b44e505286c1d/cookies_filters/cookies_uB_AG.txt#L203-L206  / https://github.com/FiltersHeroes/PolishSocialCookiesFiltersDev/blob/9898dce25da4df02dcba43bc18e1e7b87abdfb38/sections/adblock_cookies/uBO_AG/komunikaty_suplement.txt#L166-L169

comment.body: I don't have iOS devices, but can't reproduce on Android. It's likely DNS filtering is not working properly on the OP's device. I guess this can be tested by using native AdGuard DNS (+ clearing cache of the app, which I don't know if possible on iOS).

issue.title: AdGuard for Android blocks sending any media in Discord chats
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.12.77

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

discord.com

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

With AdGuard HTTPS filtering enabled on Android (Google Pixel 9 Pro), I am unable to send any media in any discord chat. It uploads and then disappears.

Turning AdGuard HTTPS filtering off resolves the issue. Reproduced this several times in a row, seems like a consistent bug.

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: AdGuard for Android blocks sending any media in Discord chats
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.12.77

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

discord.com

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

With AdGuard HTTPS filtering enabled on Android (Google Pixel 9 Pro), I am unable to send any media in any discord chat. It uploads and then disappears.

Turning AdGuard HTTPS filtering off resolves the issue. Reproduced this several times in a row, seems like a consistent bug.

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: AdGuard for Android blocks sending any media in Discord chats
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.12.77

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

discord.com

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

With AdGuard HTTPS filtering enabled on Android (Google Pixel 9 Pro), I am unable to send any media in any discord chat. It uploads and then disappears.

Turning AdGuard HTTPS filtering off resolves the issue. Reproduced this several times in a row, seems like a consistent bug.

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: I would say create an issue in the adguard for android sub or comment on my issue above or the devs can move your issue there
